headline: ‘It’s Traitorous Conduct’: Biden Facing Likelihood of Impeachment if GOP Wins Back House
author: Martin Walsh
sentences: While speaking with Just the News founder John Solomon, Texas GOP Rep. Lance Gooden, whose district has been overrun by the surge of illegal aliens, argued that Biden’s failure to secure the U.S.-Mexico border has increased the likelihood that Republicans may push to impeach Biden if the GOP regains control of Congress.
